“Diamonds are a girl’s best friend,” isn’t it? What Marilyn Monroe knew, Minecraft players now know better: Diamonds are everyone’s best friends! Finding them and farming them at the right height is one of the top disciplines for every Minecrafter – and I’ll show you how to do it right here, right now.

Version:1.9.4

Languages: German, English, French, Japanese

Release: 05/17/2009

License:Demo

Platforms: Windows XP, Windows Vista, Windows 7, Windows 8, Playstation 3, Xbox 360, Nintendo Wii U, Xbox One, Android, iOS, Windows Phone, Playstation Vita, PlayStation 4, Windows 10

Minecraft: find diamonds – preparations

diamonds belong to the most valuable and rarest Ores in Minecraft. Valuable not only because they shine pretty – but also because you can use them to craft the toughest armor and best weapons/items to date. By the way: The 2020 Nether update brings another ore that’s even harder, better, and rarer.

We pack our suitcase: Don’t forget the right tools into the depths of the Minecraft mines. This should stay in your inventory before you start your journey to the diamonds:

  • iron pickaxes or diamond pickaxe
  • Lots of torches
  • Sword against any monsters
  • Wood for boxes and possibly doors
  • bed if you mean it
  • food
  • (map for console players)
    • You can use the map to show you the levels on the console

Theoretically, of course, you only need iron– or diamond pickaxebut without a sword, torches, or food, your journey will soon be over. note: You can only mine diamonds with iron or diamond pickaxes. Do you try other types of pickaxes? does not drop diamond ore when mining and you lose the entire block. This will make you very sad.

Good to know: There aren’t more diamonds near lava than anywhere else. You just get a better look at the ore!

Diamond height to mine

You can find it in Minecraft diamond ore only in the Layers 1-15. However, it occurs most frequently in the Layers 5-13 up, so you should focus on that. The layer system (or “level system”) refers to the levels of blocks that make up each Minecraft world: generally counting from the bottom up, starting with the bedrock (“Bedrock”) on level 0 – that’s where you can’t build any further down. Of the heaven at the top, on the other hand, ends with Layer 256.

Here one Overview of the basic understanding:

Image source: https://minecraft-de.gamepedia.com/height

diamonds So you can – no matter which Minecraft map – only between the Levels 1-15 Find; just above bedrock. The level you are currently on can be viewed as a coordinate show:

  • Show coordinates on PC
    • F3 key – XYZ – Middle number (Y-axis) / Digits before the dot correspond to the height
  • Show coordinates on PS4
    • inGame item look at map – Y-coordinate corresponds to the height
  • coordinates show on Xbox One
    • inGame item look at map – Y-coordinate corresponds to the height

So, to farm diamonds in Minecraft, you dig down with your packed backpack, onto the level 12 (in approximately). It is not necessary to use a cave system for this! danger: In the depths, monsters and lava lakes are waiting to kill you. Be prepared to react quickly to lava!

Tip: Use an Iron or Diamond Pickaxe with the Luck enchantment: Then a Diamond Block will drop multiple Diamonds!

Farm diamonds – that’s the best way

At the most effectively you farm diamonds with the “Branch Mining Method“. You build one for this 2×2 block tunnels on level 12 in any direction and for any length (the longer the better). Then return to the beginning of the tunnel and start every three blocks one 1×2 block junction to dig, which is also arbitrarily long.

Find Diamonds Effectively in Minecraft Through Branch Mining!

The method is used to completely search an area on level 12 for diamonds. note: diamonds form between the Levels 5-12 diamond veinswhich in the rarest case up to nine or ten blocks can include. Besides, they could occur diagonally to each other; so when you find diamonds, always dig in all directions around them! There is usually only one wire in a chunk (16x16x256 blocks).

Step-by-step guide to effective farming: “Branch Mining”

  • Dig up level 12 down (with stairs, best)
  • Hollows out a small space
    • You only need doors if you want to separate the room from a cave!
  • Places boxes and bed
    • Possibly also a furnace for smelting ores
    • Possibly also a 1×1 hole in the ground that you fill with lava: to discard excess blocks
  • Sleep in bed!
    • So you spawn right back in your room if you die
  • Begins “branch mining(explained above)
    • Build a long one 2×2 block tunnels on level 12
    • Return to the beginning of the tunnel
    • digs every three blocks one 1×2 block junction
  • ALWAYS bring new diamonds back to your room immediately and place them in the chest

Of course, you can also find diamonds in mines and caves – just make sure that you are at the right height. “Branch Mining” is pure mining work, so you won’t experience many adventures while doing it. Simply decide for yourself whether you would rather go on an adventure trip or farm as many diamonds as possible.
